title: 317: CHATTY BROS: Relationship/Parenting Drama + Mini Bachelorette Recap + Bro’s Spelling Bee
itunes:title: 317: CHATTY BROS: Relationship/Parenting Drama + Mini Bachelorette Recap + Bro’s Spelling Bee
description:
Grayston and Evan are back to have a VERY Bro’s style episode! First they dive into Gray’s upcoming trip, Evan questions potential relationship/parenting drama and needs Gray’s takes, they parallel Peter to one of Michelle’s students, question Jamie, analyze Ryan’s playbook tactics, and then they try their hand at a 5th grade Spelling Bee competition! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***EMBARK: Go to EMBARKVET.COM to get free shipping and save $50 with promo code CHATTY

***ETTITUDE: get 20% off your order + free shipping at ETTITUDE.COM/CHATTY and enter code CHATTY

***PILL CLUB: The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every listener who becomes a patient. Use THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY link to get your birth control care package and make that donation!

***EVERLYWELL: get 20% off an at-home lab test at EVERLYWELL.COM/CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
